example.text: It is clear that Saudi Arabia’s actions in Yemen have not advanced US interests. Our bipartisan Yemen War Powers Resolution is a targeted response to Saudi Arabia’s troubling conduct, which persisted despite years of repeated concerns from American officials.

The House-sponsored Yemen War Powers Resolution has 119 bipartisan cosponsors, including multiple House Committee Chairs, several Members of the House Foreign Affairs, Armed Services, and Intelligence Committees, and Democratic Leader-Elect Hakeem Jeffries. ###
